com.wolvencraft.yasp

Class LocalSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wolvencraft.yasp.LocalSession
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OfflineSession

    public class LocalSession
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a user session for a tracked player.
    This object is destroyed if the player is online after the database synchronization.
    Author:
    bitWolfy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalSession(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Default constructor
      Creates a new user session based on the Player specified

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BlocksData blocks()
      Returns the data store that contains information about broken and placed blocks
      DeathsData deaths()
      Returns the data store that contains information about miscellaneous player deaths.
      Does not include PVP or PVE.
      void dump()
      Clears the data stores of all locally saved data.
      boolean getConfirmed()
      Checks if the player has spent more then the log_delay on the server.
      java.lang.String getPlayerName()
      PlayersData wrapper.
      Returns the unique player name.
      boolean isOnline()
      PlayersData wrapper
      Returns the player's current online status.
      ItemsData items()
      Returns the data store that contains information about item operations
      PlayersData player()
      Returns the generic player data store.
      Contains such information as player's online status, experience, health and food levels, distances traveled, etc.
      PlayerTotals playerTotals()
      Returns the player statistics fetched from the database.
      void pushData()
      Performs an operation to push the locally stored data to the database.
      Synchronization is performed in the following order: Generic player data Blocks Items PVP deaths PVE deaths Other deaths Any active hooks Fetch player totals
      PVEData PVE()
      Returns the data store that contains the PVE information related to the player
      PVPData PVP()
      Returns the data store that contains the PVP information related to the player
      void setConfirmed(boolean confirmed)
      Sets the confirmation status for the player

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalSession

        public LocalSession(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Default constructor
        Creates a new user session based on the Player specified
        Parameters:
        player - Player to track

    • Method Detail

      • pushData

        public void pushData()
        Performs an operation to push the locally stored data to the database.
        Synchronization is performed in the following order:
        • Generic player data
        • Blocks
        • Items
        • PVP deaths
        • PVE deaths
        • Other deaths
        • Any active hooks
        • Fetch player totals

      • dump

        public void dump()
        Clears the data stores of all locally saved data.

      • getPlayerName

        public java.lang.String getPlayerName()
        PlayersData wrapper.
        Returns the unique player name.
        Returns:
        String Player name

      • isOnline

        public boolean isOnline()
        PlayersData wrapper
        Returns the player's current online status.
        Returns:
        true if online, false otherwise

      • getConfirmed

        public boolean getConfirmed()
        Checks if the player has spent more then the log_delay on the server.
        Returns:
        true if the player is confirmed, false if he is on hold

      • setConfirmed

        public void setConfirmed(boolean confirmed)
        Sets the confirmation status for the player
        Parameters:
        confirmed - true if the player is confirmed, false if he is on hold

      • player

        public PlayersData player()
        Returns the generic player data store.
        Contains such information as player's online status, experience, health and food levels, distances traveled, etc.
        Returns:
        PlayersData data store

        Returns the data store that contains information about broken and placed blocks

        Returns the data store that contains information about item operations

        public DeathsData deaths()

        Does not include PVP or PVE.
        Returns:
        DeathsData data store
